00066 #define TRUE  1
00067 #define FALSE 0

00081 static volatile union adcUnion
00082 {
00083   volatile uint16_t  adcInt;
00084   volatile uint8_t   adcByte[2];
00085 } adc;
00086 
00092 static volatile uint8_t  adcDataValid;
00093 static volatile uint8_t  adcBusy = FALSE;
00095 static volatile uint16_t adcValue[NUMBER_OF_ADC_CHANNELS];
00096 static volatile uint8_t  adcChannel;  
00097 static volatile uint8_t  adcMode;     
00098 static volatile uint8_t  adcScanMask; 
00099 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE == 1
00100 static volatile uint8_t  previousChannel;
00101 static volatile uint8_t  adcChannelMask;
00102 #endif
00103 
00104 static void writeAdmux(uint8_t channel);

00106 /****************************************************************************/
00130 uint8_t adcInit(uint8_t mode, uint16_t adcClock)
00131 {
00132   if (adcBusy) return FALSE;      /* Bomb out if not ready */
00133   adcMode = mode;                 /* Save this for other functions */
00134 
00136 #if ADC_DYNAMIC_CLOCK == 1
00137   uint16_t cpuFrequency = F_CPU/1000;
00138   uint8_t adcDivisorTemp = cpuFrequency/adcClock;
00139   uint16_t adcDivisor = 256;
00140   uint8_t adcPrescaler = 8;
00141   uint8_t x = 0;
00142   do
00143   {
00144     adcDivisor = adcDivisor/2;
00145     x = adcDivisorTemp/adcDivisor;
00146     adcPrescaler--;
00147   }
00148   while(x==0);
00151   if((cpuFrequency/adcDivisor) >= ((adcClock*12)/10)) adcPrescaler++;
00152   if (adcPrescaler > 8) return FALSE;
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 /* Make sure that all ADC work has ceased by forcing it off */
00156   outb(ADC_CONTROL_REG, 0);   /* Turns off ADEN - terminates conversions */
00157   sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADIF); /* force clear the interrupt flag */
00158 
00159 #if defined(PRR)
00160   cbi(PRR, PRADC);            /* Force out of ADC power reduction mode */
00161 #endif
00162 
00163 /* Enable the ADC and set the clock*/
00164 #if ADC_DYNAMIC_CLOCK == 1
00165   outb(ADC_CONTROL_REG, (_BV(ADEN) | adcPrescaler));
00166 #else
00167   outb(ADC_CONTROL_REG, (_BV(ADEN) | ADC_PRESCALER));
00168 #endif
00169 
00170 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE == 1
00171 
00172   if(adcMode & FREERUN)
00173   {
00174     sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, AD_FREERUN );
00175 #if defined(AD_TRIGGER_REG)
00176     cbi(AD_TRIGGER_REG,ADTS0);
00177     cbi(AD_TRIGGER_REG,ADTS1);
00178     cbi(AD_TRIGGER_REG,ADTS2);
00179 #endif
00180   }
00181 #endif
00182 
00183 #if ADC_INTERRUPT_MODE == 1
00184 /* Enable interrupts */
00185   if(adcMode & INTERRUPT)
00186   {
00187     sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADIE);
00188     sei();
00189   }
00190 #endif
00191   return TRUE;
00192 }
00193 
00194 /****************************************************************************/
00220 uint8_t adcStart(uint8_t channelMask)
00221 {
00222   if (adcBusy) return FALSE;      /* Bomb out if not ready */
00223   sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADIF);     /* Force clear the interrupt flag */
00224 
00225 /* Find the first channel to scan and set it. If none, bomb out.*/
00226   if (channelMask == 0) return FALSE;   /* Oops! - Nothing to do! */
00227   adcScanMask = channelMask;
00228   adcChannel = 0;
00232   while((adcScanMask & 1) == 0)
00233   {
00234     adcChannel++;
00235     adcScanMask >>= 1;
00236   }
00237   writeAdmux(adcChannel);         /* set the first channel */
00238   adcDataValid = 0;               /* mask of valid converted data */
00239 
00240 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE == 1
00241   previousChannel = adcChannel;   /* we need this to manage freerun mode */
00242   adcChannelMask = channelMask;   /* keep aside for reloading */
00243 #endif
00244 
00245 #if (ADC_PORT_IS_BIDIRECTIONAL == 1)
00246 /* Set the relevant ADC channel ports to be inputs */
00247 /* Preserve the pin directions on all ADC port pins except those mentioned in
00248 the channel mask. Set those to inputs (0) */
00249   outb(ADC_PORT_DDR_REG, inb(ADC_PORT_DDR_REG) & ~channelMask);
00250 #endif
00251 
00252 /* Fire off the first conversion */
00253   sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADSC);
00254   adcBusy = TRUE;
00255 
00264 #if ADC_SLEEP_MODE == 1
00265   if(adcMode & SLEEP)
00266   {
00267 #if defined(SE)
00268 #if (ADC_SPECIFIC_SLEEP_MODE == 1)
00269     sbi(SLEEP_REG, SM0);
00270     cbi(SLEEP_REG, SM1);
00271     cbi(SLEEP_REG, SM2);
00272 #endif
00273     sbi(SLEEP_REG, SE);
00274 #endif
00275 /* Go to sleep. The ADC interrupt ISR will wake up the AVR */
00276     asm("sleep");
00277     asm("nop");
00278     asm("nop");
00279   }
00280 #endif
00281 
00282 return TRUE;
00283 }
00284 
00285 /****************************************************************************/
00293 uint8_t adcIsBusy(void)
00294 {
00295   return adcBusy;
00296 }
00297 
00298 /****************************************************************************/
00321 int adcRead(uint8_t channel)
00322 {
00328   if(!(adcMode & INTERRUPT))
00329   {
00330     if ((inb(ADC_CONTROL_REG) & _BV(ADIF)) > 0)
00331     {
00332       adc.adcByte[0]=inb(ADCL);   /* result from hardware data registers */
00333       adc.adcByte[1]=inb(ADCH);
00334 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE == 1
00335       if  (adcMode & FREERUN)
00336       {
00338         if (adcScanMask == 0) adcScanMask = adcChannelMask;
00341         adcValue[previousChannel]=adc.adcValue;
00342         adcDataValid |= _BV(previousChannel); /* Set the valid data mask bit */
00343         previousChannel = adcChannel;       /* keep aside for next time */
00344       }
00345       else
00346 #endif
00347       {
00348         adcValue[adcChannel] = adc.adcInt;
00349         adcDataValid |= _BV(adcChannel);    /* Set the valid data mask bit */
00350       }
00351       adcScanMask >>= 1;                    /* shift out current channel bit */
00352       if (adcScanMask == 0) adcBusy = FALSE;/* if none left, we are done */
00353       else
00354       {
00357         adcChannel++;
00358         while((adcScanMask & 1) == 0)
00359         {
00360           adcChannel++;
00361           adcScanMask >>= 1;
00362         }
00363         writeAdmux(adcChannel);     /* set it for the next scan */
00364 
00365 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE != 1
00366         sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADSC); /* Fire off next conversion */
00367 #endif
00368       }
00369     }
00370   }
00373   if ((adcDataValid & _BV(channel)) == 0) return -1;
00374   cli();                            /* make sure the ISR doesn't stuff us up */
00375   adcDataValid &= ~_BV(channel);    /* Clear the valid data mask bit */
00376   sei();
00377   return adcValue[channel];         /* and send back the result */
00378 }
00379 
00380 /****************************************************************************/
00388 void abortConversion()
00389 {
00390   outb(ADC_CONTROL_REG, 0);   /* Turns off ADEN - terminates conversions */
00391   sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADIF); /* force clear the interrupt flag */
00392 }
00393 
00394 /****************************************************************************/
00413 #if ADC_INTERRUPT_MODE == 1
00414 
00415 SIGNAL(SIG_ADC)
00416 {
00417 #if defined(SE)
00418   sbi(SLEEP_REG, SE);
00419 #endif
00420   sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADIF); /* Force clear the interrupt flag */
00421   adc.adcByte[0]=inb(ADCL);   /* result from the hardware data registers */
00422   adc.adcByte[1]=inb(ADCH);
00423 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE == 1
00424   if  (adcMode & FREERUN)
00425   {
00427     if (adcScanMask == 0) adcScanMask = adcChannelMask;
00430     adcValue[previousChannel]=adc.adcValue;
00431     adcDataValid |= _BV(previousChannel); /* Set the valid data mask bit */
00432     previousChannel = adcChannel;         /* keep aside for next time */
00433   }
00434   else
00435 #endif
00436   {
00437     adcValue[adcChannel] = adc.adcInt;    /* Get the result to the buffer */
00438     adcDataValid |= _BV(adcChannel);      /* Set the valid data mask bit */
00439   }
00440   adcScanMask >>= 1;                      /* shift out current channel bit */
00441   if (adcScanMask == 0) adcBusy = FALSE;  /* if none left, we are done */
00442   else
00443   {
00446     adcChannel++;
00447     while((adcScanMask & 1) == 0)
00448     {
00449       adcChannel++;
00450       adcScanMask >>= 1;
00451     }
00452     writeAdmux(adcChannel);               /* set it for the next scan */
00453 
00454 #if ADC_FREERUN_MODE != 1
00455     sbi(ADC_CONTROL_REG, ADSC);           /* Fire off next conversion */
00456 #endif
00457   }
00458 }
00459 #endif
00460 
00461 /****************************************************************************/
00469 static void writeAdmux(uint8_t channel)
00470 {
00471   outb(ADC_MUX_REG, ((inb(ADC_MUX_REG) & 0xF8)|(channel & 0x07)));
00472 }
